import sys

k = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
a, b = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))

if (b - a) % k == 0:
    print("OK")
else:
    print("NG")

a, b, k = map(int, input().split())
if a % k == 0 or b % k == 0 or (b-a >= k):
    print('OK')
else:
    print('NG')

import sys

input_line = sys.stdin.readline()
k = int(input_line)

input_line = sys.stdin.readline()
a, b = [int(x) for x in input_line.split()]

for i in range(a, b + 1):
    if i % k == 0:
        print("OK")
        sys.exit()

print("NG")
